page.title: 09HEALTH IN THE SHREWLEY AREA
page.content:
The local doctor in Little Shrewley came out to visit the sick from Shrewley. The inhabitants of Little Shrewley had no complaints about the doctor,they thought he was marvellous. The doctor would write out the prescription at the house and then provide them with the medicine straight away.This saved the people having to travel to a chemist.
The main doctors surgery was in Shrew- ley Common. Therefore Shrewley Common people lived within walking distance of the surgery.
If hospitals are needed locals go to Birmingham Hospital or Leamington and Warwick Hospital.Fortunately there are no specific illnesses that anyone in this area regularly suffers.
